name: query_vulnerabilities
description: List (w/filters) vulnerability records known by the system, with affected packages information if present

id.description: The ID of the vulnerability (e.g. CVE-1999-0001)

affected_package.description: Filter results by specified package name (e.g. sed)

affected_package_version.description: Filter results by specified package version (e.g. 4.4-1)

page.description: The page of results to fetch. Pages start at 1

limit.description: Limit the number of records for the requested page. If omitted or set to 0, return all results in a single page

namespace.description: Namespace(s) to filter vulnerability records by

$block: Properties for common pagination handling to be included in any wrapping object that needs pagination elements

$ul: **next_page**: True if additional pages exist (page + 1) or False if this is the last page
**page**: The page number returned (should match the requested page query string param)
**returned_count**: The number of items sent in this response
**vulnerabilities**: The listing of matching vulnerabilities for the query subject to pagination
**detail**: Details structure for additional information about the error if available. Content and structure will be error specific.
